backend/main.mo: Defines financial goals, investments, linking structures, analytics types, access control, and CRUD-supporting state for the Motoko backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to their human‑written functional summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base, components, and utilities with OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, actor readiness, profile setup, dashboard rendering, and connection error states.
frontend/src/components/AddGoalDialog.ts: Dialog component for creating financial goals with actor readiness gating and form submission logic.
frontend/src/components/AddInvestmentDia: Dialog component for creating a new investment with category, subcategory, amounts, and date, submitting via useAddInvestment.
Empty placeholder file for the analytics module component.
frontend/src/components/ConnectionErrorS: Displays a detailed connection error message with retry handling and conditional guidance for canister-stopped cases.
Fetches and visualizes dashboard analytics including goals, investments, charts, and summaries using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/EditGoalDialog.t: Dialog for editing an existing financial goal, updating name, amount, date, and category via useUpdateFinancialGoal.
frontend/src/components/EditInvestmentDi: Dialog for editing an investment’s category, subcategory, values, and date, submitting updates through useUpdateInvestment.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright, a link to caffeine.ai, and a GitHub icon.
frontend/src/components/GoalsModule.tsx: Fetches and displays financial goals with analytics, and supports adding, editing, linking investments, and deleting goals.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation bar with theme toggle, login/logout handling, and user profile avatar.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentsModul: Shows the user's investment portfolio, calculates gains, and provides add, edit, and delete investment actions.
frontend/src/components/LinkInvestmentDi: Dialog for linking an investment to a financial goal, allowing selection and allocation of an amount.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Simple profile setup form that saves the user's name before onboarding completes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorClient.ts: Builds an actor client with optional admin-token initialization and exposes query state for consumer components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReadiness.ts: Manages actor initialization readiness with caching, timeout handling, and replica error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and AuthClient setup for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefetchTabQueries: Prefetches dashboard, goals, and analytics queries once the actor is ready to speed up tab switching.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, goals, investments, and analytics via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark theme color systems.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page with tabbed navigation for dashboard, goals, and investments, using prefetching for performance.
frontend/src/utils/dashboardAnalytics.ts: Utility functions for generating investment time series and goal deadline insights.
frontend/src/utils/icReplicaErrors.ts: Classifies IC replica errors, detecting canister-stopped conditions and providing normalized error info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL/query/hash params and persisting them in sessionStorage, with helpers to clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the app’s architecture, features, and known issues for the FinancePro full‑stack ICP financial planner.
